name: Te Pito O'Te Kaiŋa
description:
TE PITO O’TE KAŊA (THE LITTLE PIECE OF LAND) is the definitive 2D puzzle platforming game based on the people and culture of Rapa Nui, or Easter Island, filled with fun gameplay, memorable characters and a bright, colourful art style. Enter the shoes of Kuhane as he traverses the island he calls home, solving puzzles themed around platforming or interaction and learn as much as you can about the culture and language of the island through the robust and detailed word collection system, and all with a bright and artistic aesthetic. 

Our Team STUDIO HONU:

Adam Lomax (Manager, Programmer)

Tom Galbo (Art Director, General Artist)

Rowan Fitton (Lead Writer, Producer)

Keelan Smith (Lead Programmer)

Harry Lynch (2D Artist)

Jack Millington (Level Designer)
